  • Constructor Details

    • GameSettings

      public GameSettings(javafx.stage.Stage settingsStage, Runnable onSettingsApplied)
      Constructor to initialize game settings.
      Parameters:
      settingsStage - The stage that will display the game settings
      onSettingsApplied - Runnable to reset the game on first launch, or when new settings are accepted.

  • Method Details

    • getSettingsScene

      public javafx.scene.Scene getSettingsScene()
      Build the Settings UI window Pane for display on screen.
      Returns:
      The Scene containing the display Pane.

    • updateSettings

      public void updateSettings(int newHeight, int newWidth, int newMines)
      Update game settings when valid settings are entered. This will also start a new game.
      Parameters:
      newHeight - The new grid height.
      newWidth - The new grid width.
      newMines - The new number of mines in the grid.

    • getUserErrorMessageText

      protected String getUserErrorMessageText(int height, int width)
      Text to display to the user (via UI) or developer (via console) when candidate game settings are invalid.
      Parameters:
      height - The candidate height, needed to calculate the valid number of mines.
      width - The candidate width, needed to calculate the valid number of mines.
      Returns:
      the text to display.
